item.title: GhFP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A11G2808 Gene Symbol: GhFP1 Gene Name: Fibre-related Protein 1 Genome: AADD genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A basic helix–loop–helix protein (GhFP1) promotes fibre elongation of cotton (Gossypium hirsutum) by modulating brassinosteroid biosynthesis and signalling.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D01G0420 Gene Symbol: GhIQD10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of GhIQD10 promoted resistance to verticillium wilt in cotton.

item.title: GmMYB14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19g164600 Gene Symbol: GmMYB14 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmMYB14-OX plants showed reduced endogenous BR contents, while exogenous application of brassinolide could partly rescue the phenotype of GmMYB14-OX plants.

item.title: MdBIM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000143208 Gene Symbol: MdBIM1 Gene Name: BES1-INTERACTING MYC-LIKE PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Brassinosteroid signaling regulator BIM1 (MdBIM1) integrates brassinolide and jasmonic acid signaling during cold tolerance in apple.

item.title: MdBIN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdBIN2 Gene Name: Malus domestica BRASSINOSTEROID INSENSITIVE2 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdBZR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000157809 Gene Symbol: MdBZR1 Gene Name: BRASSINAZOLE-RESISTANT 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Revealed the antagonistic relationship between light and brassinosteroid (BR) signaling pathways, which is mediated by BRASSINAZOLE-RESISTANT 1 (MdBZR1) and the B-box protein MdCOL6.

item.title: MdCOL6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD17G1243400 Gene Symbol: MdCOL6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The regulatory module MdBZR1–MdCOL6 mediates brassinosteroid- and light-regulated anthocyanin synthesis in apple.

item.title: MdPHR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD05G1189400 Gene Symbol: MdPHR1 Gene Name: PHOSPHATE STARVATION RESPONSE1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: determined that MdPHR1 was essential for Pi deficiency-induced anthocyanin accumulation in apple (Malus × domestica).

item.title: TaSK1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaSK1A Gene Name: SHAGGY-like kinase1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: We report the identification and structural characterization of two GSK homologs named TaSK1 and TaSK2 in the hexaploid wheat genome as well as a widespread phylogenetic analysis of land plant GSKs.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaSK2C Gene Name: SHAGGY-like kinase2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: We report the identification and structural characterization of two GSK homologs named TaSK1 and TaSK2 in the hexaploid wheat genome as well as a widespread phylogenetic analysis of land plant GSKs.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2D01G502900 Gene Symbol: TaSPL8 Gene Name: SQUAMOSA PROMOTER BINDING-LIKE 8 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat TaSPL8 Modulates Leaf Angle Through Auxin and Brassinosteroid Signaling.
